website_summaries.verdict: With an innovative design that transforms into a backpack in a matter of seconds, this bassinet is ready to go wherever you do. Cute, comfortable, and easy to carry.
pros: Easy to use and highly portable
Waterproof base is ideal for outdoor use
Comes with a removable canopy to block light
Removable toy bar with 2 toys offer on-the-go entertainment
Backpack straps allow for hands-free carrying
cons: Little ones may quickly outgrow the smaller dimensions

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel/flights
customer_reviews.text: Super light and easy to use, I used it for my 9 month old baby on a 15 hours flight ! Life saver she slept so good 😊 highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Natali

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely buy this! Possibly THE best baby purchase I’ve ever done. I put my 2.5 month in there with the canopy and the toys and she stays entertained for a long time (she used to want mom only before), and then when I notice she’s getting sleepy, I take the toys on the canopy off and she falls asleep BY HERSELF, which she never used to do before. We use it as a cosleeper which is great, and it’s so lightweight that we bring it downstairs on the couch during the day. We haven’t traveled yet, but needless to say, this bed is following us wherever we go because it’s the best thing ever!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Must have for new moms
customer_reviews.text: I cannot possibly say enough about how amazing this little invention is. I am a new mom who is exclusively breastfeeding and this has made all the difference for me. We put it on the bed so it is easy to just pick baby up in the middle of the night for feedings. We also take it with us when we are visiting family. During the day we use it when we are chilling downstairs too. It is so lightweight and portable. This will definitely be my go to gift at babyshowers!! Did I mention the cover is machine washable too! Amazing 😉
customer_reviews.author: Mina

customer_reviews.title: Baby magic!
customer_reviews.text: Baby magic! My 2 1/2 month old loves this. She watches the stuffed triangles dangle above her head, and kicks her legs up on the soft walls. And, she's fallen asleep in it on her own (which is a big deal for us!) It's light weight and a pretty little piece of baby furniture. The bottom cushion is a little thin, but is sufficient. I will put it on our rug to provide an extra soft surface.
customer_reviews.author: Julianna Orange

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit disappointed to be honest. First, the way it was packaged is not very good. The bassinet is folded into a curve and comes with instructions on how to make is oval again. Despite trying twice or thrice, we still couldn't get it to be oval. It was not until after a week of being open that it started to look oval. There is absolutely no bottom support. The sides are too soft and we always fear that the baby might roll over. Overall it feels flimsy. Not what I had expected and definitely not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Farrukh K

customer_reviews.title: My daughter is absolutely Love her you LulyBoo
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is absolutely Love her you LulyBoo!!! I was looking for a comfortable and easy to carry bed style to travel with. I love that idea that she have the same place to sleep no matter where we go and the most important is that don’t need to worry about here rolling off The bed. Definitely recommended the best solution I found for traveling with baby’s!!
customer_reviews.author: revital

customer_reviews.title: Great infant bed
customer_reviews.text: This was our baby’s first bed. It was great to be able to put it on an ottoman, sofa, dresser, table, etc. wherever we were. She slept in it in her crib at night until she outgrew it, around 7 months old. It’s easy to wash the cover, but the second time I washed it some of the color leeched out. It looks like I got bleach on it, but I wasn’t using bleach. I was using an enzyme stain remover on some baby clothes in the same laundry load, so maybe that was the cause.
customer_reviews.author: charlotte eloise

customer_reviews.title: Super easy and light to move around.
customer_reviews.text: Just got this for my newest granddaughter and we love it! It was super easy to set up and my daughter can move it from room to room. I am excited because she can also easily fold it up and bring it over to my house for naptime instead of setting up a pillow fort for her newborn. Wish I had this with all my other grandkids! She said the cover is easy to take off and wash as well. I appreciate the 2 extra washable pads and the hood for extra protection from pets. I will certainly recommend it to my friends for their grandbabies!
customer_reviews.author: deb77

customer_reviews.title: Amazing #1 travel accessory
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product for traveling! We took it all over Europe with us and it was perfect for co sleeping in hotels and also for poolside naps and anywhere else you can bring the babe with you :) very happy with my purchase !
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Not safe for baby! Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely terrible and not safe for infants. The way it folds up and opens causes it to never actually be a flat surface for baby. The bed if even slightly bumped starts to fold in on the baby. I’m shocked this product is on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bed-sharing with your little one
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this little bed! My baby always wants to sleep with us in our bed but we are always afraid of squishing her because she is so tiny. Once we started using this, she began sleeping through the night at 2 months! I get a lot better sleep as well knowing she is safe and close by. My baby nephew did spill some food on the white cover and it didn't come out very well but we still love it.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah B.

customer_reviews.title: Just not for me personally
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning this because I was worried about how soft it was and my son was still a newborn at the time. I like the idea but I was too worried about him shoving his face in the sides or something. Probably ok if you plan on watching your child in it the entire time, I was too afraid to leave him and it defeated the purpose of why I wanted something like this.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Kreindel

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I ever bought
customer_reviews.text: We had to travel when our baby was born and I was concerned about finding something he could sleep in with us that was easy to pack. This was a godsend! Easy, light, packable. I don’t know if they sell additional covers, but we did have an accident once and had to wash and wait for it to air dry. Just a design recommendation - It would be nice if just the bottom part could zip off and was wash and dryable. However, that’s pretty minor. Still glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.author: KLS

customer_reviews.title: We finally found our in-bed co-sleeping solution
customer_reviews.text: We have struggled with bedside co-sleepers, bassinets, pack n plays and in-bed co-sleepers since our first child. If you sleep on a large, firm mattress, this in-bed co-sleeper may be for you! We are getting more consecutive hours of sleep for our little guy with this than with anything else and it’s easy to put a hand on him while we are still in bed. It’s easy to clean, cute looking and should serve us well for these first few months of life. Of note: We have not traveled with it, but it is light and easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Dmithal

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This thing is neat. I bought it to use on the top on my huge nightstand for my newborn to sleep in at night. Our bedroom isn’t big enough for a pack and play or a freestanding bassinet. The bottom of it is cushioned a little but I still put down a folded bath towel under it to keep it still a firm surface but a little more comfortable for my baby. Works like a charm! I have already taken the cover off and washed it in the washing machine. So easy!
customer_reviews.author: MarLee Grier

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our newborn. From day one the baby wanted to sleep with me (even in the hospital the baby would cry till she was in my arms) it was a great co-sleeper. It was a tight squeeze in our queen size bed but it worked out ok. Baby slept amazingly well in it. The soft cushion walls gave me peace of mind that my husband and I wouldn’t roll over on her. Easy to clean, and reassemble.
customer_reviews.author: MegTracy

customer_reviews.title: 2nd purchase - Love these bassinets
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd Lulyboo bassinet I have purchased for my daughter. It has been an awesome help with a new baby. When I keep the baby I bring the Lulyboo to my house. The first one we used with 2 baby girls. This one is for baby boy. They are great for parents and grandparents!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Burba

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This works really well to help my baby feel secure while sleeping. It is good quality. I like that the cover can be removed to be washed, although putting it back on is a pain. Still, removable is good. The canopy is a great addition, sturdy, and removable. The bottom is moderately padded. The lad is not separate though so it’s not the safest to add a sheet. Overall this has been a lifesaver for us and I foresee using it until my baby outgrows it.
customer_reviews.author: Love My Kindle

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2nd child and I don't know how I did without it with my 1st! I bring it everywhere! She sleeps in it, plays in it, and I change her diaper in it! The high walls create a perfect barrier from wind! The canopy creates perfect shade from the sun! It's perfectly cushioned!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: We used this in our bed when our son was first home, then moved it to the pack n play, and now use it for naps around the house or when we visit others. It does not easily fold into a backpack like the pic would insinuate, but its light & portable enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Only downside is the sleeping portion is ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Only downside is the sleeping portion is a bit soft instead of firm which is usually desired for an infant. Also it’s not removable so it can be a bit inconvenient to clean up after spit ups or diaper blowouts. Otherwise the ease of folding and transporting is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Convenient for travel
customer_reviews.text: This was great for my baby to sleep in beside me on a hotel king size bed when he was 3 months. Now that he’s bigger I use it during the day time for him to rest in and play with a teething toy on the floor next to me while I work on the computer. It keeps him contained (for now)
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Pretty useful
customer_reviews.text: Pretty useful product. My only complaint is it is not possible to replace pad cover or put a protective cover on it which you desperately need.
customer_reviews.author: Citak

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient for travel!
customer_reviews.text: We used this while traveling internationally! It's super convenient, especially as it folds up so compact. Our baby slept in it in airport lounges and wherever we stayed. Since our baby doesn't sleep in her stroller, this was great for us.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Levy

customer_reviews.title: Missing Plush Toys
customer_reviews.text: The item came but the plush toys that’s were supposed to come with it were completely missing. The manual even says it’s supposed to be included but it wasn’t in the box. Reshaping it was fairly easy from the banana shape but my guess is you’d have to do that every single time after unclipping it which over time may prove tedious. Really like the item though
customer_reviews.author: L. Lincoln

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling with an infant
customer_reviews.text: Took this on a trip when baby was 3 mo, worked great as a bed and then could carry it like a backpack down to the pool/beach to keep baby safe and comfy. Wish the material on the shade was thicker though, still too bright in there when outside in the sun. Once baby can roll well, have to stop using for safety reasons. For this reason it seemed more cost-effective than the doc-a-tot since the period of time for use is limited.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BABY ESSENTIAL!! Better than all other co sleepers..
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing sooo much! As a owner of a doc a tot the Lulyboo is like it but way more versatile ! I love co sleeping with the lily boo way more ! It has higher sides so I’m not scared he’s going to roll out but still has a breathable fabric. I can take it to the beach and use it as a co sleeper even diaper changer in my car!! The sun shade makes this even next level because I can take my son and know that he’s going to be out of the sun, while I play with my daughter and added bonus I can fold it all up.. so easy MUST BUY
customer_reviews.author: William Brent Kaser

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to fold.. when you get this it looks a bit odd(miss shaped) but just leave it out so it can shape back to its original form.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Small length, weak base, strong walls
customer_reviews.text: The co-sleeper bassinet is good for its purpose. I used it to co-sleep my baby, But the bassinet does not have a firm mattress below dues to which it can only be used with a bed below or a firm mattress thing below. Alone bassinet cannot support the baby. Also the length of bassinet is pretty small. Baby can outgrow in 2 to 3 months. So I found this bassinet pricey for such lighter base and small length.
customer_reviews.author: mylove

customer_reviews.title: Love this! This is going to be perfect for ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! This is going to be perfect for our grandson. I bought it as a safety precaution when he visits. Instead of putting him on a regular bed and circling him with pillows we can just put this on the bed and put him securely inside.
customer_reviews.author: ctw58

customer_reviews.title: Great for the RV and Hotel Rooms
customer_reviews.text: We've used this many times for a safe infant sleep station in our RV bed and also in a hotel or condo while on vacation. We position this between my husband and I on the bed and our son sleeps just fine. He's really tall for his age (4 months) though and will soon be too long to use this bed. We like the ease of folding it up as wearing as a backpack as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sally A. Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: portable and lightweight, great for newborns
customer_reviews.text: Very portable and lightweight to take all around the house. I liked being able to bring it anywhere and having a fairly safe place to lay my newborn that was a big roller.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Brunke

customer_reviews.title: This was perfect for my grand daughter to sleep in at the ...
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my grand daughter to sleep in at the beach. She would play with the balls until she'd fall asleep. It was soft and roomy. My daughter in law loved that I had it for them to use. She's borrowing it for their trips to the ranch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and safe
customer_reviews.text: The Lulyboo is great! My 2.5 year old slept in it (and loved it) for a couple of weeks while awaiting the birth of the baby the bassinet was purchased for. Our newborn slept in it while we "coslept" and my worrisome hubby slept peacefully knowing we weren't going to drop or roll over baby while sleeping. If I could change something it would be for the canopy to be able to extend lower to cover the baby's face from the sun or light.
customer_reviews.author: AngyAbz

customer_reviews.title: So easy
customer_reviews.text: I love this bassinet! I use it as a co-sleeper and carry it around the house. If I need to use the bathroom cook in the kitchen hang out in the living room... it's soooooo easy love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: They love it, they use it in the living room ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son and his wife for the new baby. They love it, they use it in the living room during the day, also they take it with them every place they go. It is great to have a bed for the little one anyplace they happen to be.
customer_reviews.author: onedailey

customer_reviews.title: Wished the canopy cover was collapsible
customer_reviews.text: This is very convenient for traveling it’s dirt but I did add covers inside for my newborn for extra cushion. Easy to fold I like that it has a canopy but it’s hard to travel with the canopy cover. Can’t fold with canopy cover attached
customer_reviews.author: Ashley D

customer_reviews.title: Too pricey and worthless in size and comfort
customer_reviews.text: The product is too pricey and the base is very unstable ... you cannot take it for out door ... the size is also good for maximum of one and a half month old infant only
customer_reviews.author: Ashokan Rajendran

customer_reviews.title: Very well made!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely am in love and could not be more impressed with this family built business! I was a little unimpressed with price until I received item!! It’s a steal and glad to help out a local built in America business. And can’t forget my large 7 months old son loves it and no longer falls off of anything!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Ann

customer_reviews.title: Requested item from a “Mom to be”
customer_reviews.text: This was a baby shower gift so I can’t answer the questions, however the “Mom to be” requested this item specifically and was pleased when she opened it.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Landry

customer_reviews.title: worth it!
customer_reviews.text: awesome for vacation or sitter with limited space! my daughter is almost 4 months old, on the chunky side, and still has some room to grow in this! she uses it at my MIL house and currently is passed out in it on vacation. i put a munchkin vibrating pad under if for fussy times and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: casie

customer_reviews.title: This little bed is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I can bring it anywhere and my baby feels like she's home. She sleeps in it every night and it keeps her contained and cozy. She absolutely loves her bed, I can put it anywhere and not worry about her falling off.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Lutin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for baby and great value!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bassinet! I bought the Lulyboo after much research into what would be best for my baby when i gave birth. My son enjoyed it, he was comfortable in it and best of all it has a canopy that can be removed if with attachable toys! We used it at home and when we traveled with him to visit family. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Bourne Moore

customer_reviews.title: So the zipper broke after I washed it once and ...
customer_reviews.text: So the zipper broke after I washed it once and it only lasted a month. At first it worked out well but is very difficult to wash and put back together :(
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Love It For My Newborn!!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my newborn baby and extremely useful. It is also very portable and lightweight to take baby in and out and travel too. Easy to move since it’s super light yet large and easy to clean since it is waterproof. Love this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Cps

customer_reviews.title: Great co-sleeper
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to assemble what little there was. It "puffed" right up. Baby to be born shortly and just waiting to put him in it. It is as described and shown in pic's. It looks comfy for the baby with a decent amount of room and I'm sure he will love it!
customer_reviews.author: baseball mom

customer_reviews.title: Best for newborn to 6 mo
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to keep this but my baby is long and 5 months old. We got this for traveling but he could not stretch his legs. It would have been perfect if we had bought this earlier on. I would definitely recommend to buy for newborn to 6 mo.
customer_reviews.author: Mayorgas

customer_reviews.title: Nice look
customer_reviews.text: Very cute look. It is very comfortable item for me, because we often stays for night in grandma's house and baby can sleep next to me on bed. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Elzbieta

customer_reviews.title: The dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: I fell hard for not knowing what I needed after having my first baby. I bought this when my son was 2 months old hes pretty much out grown it at 6 months. The dog has claimed it now. It Was nice to have as a portable crib for traveling also letting your child sleeping up while you're next to him on the couch or folding laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer E.

customer_reviews.title: Great idea
customer_reviews.text: My daughter couldn't manage without this invention. The padding is a little things, just take another blanket to add some more padding. This is wonderful for when you're doing a play date and baby wants to nap, or you're in another room and you want to have baby near.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: False advertising.
customer_reviews.text: The bassist is cheaply made. It's absolutely not for my baby. He couldn't roll in it at 8 weeks old. Also the bottom is so thin that it's just like having a paper towel underneath it. This thing is only good for co-sleeping. And it's very tiny.
customer_reviews.author: RTM

customer_reviews.title: Safety concerns
customer_reviews.text: I sent this back. The bed is very narrow and very plush. I worried that with the solid sides it posed a safety hazard. I wouldn’t feel comfortable letting a baby sleep in this.
customer_reviews.author: Beekimus

customer_reviews.title: Not long or wide
customer_reviews.text: Not to happy about this - I had an older one (7years) that was better - didn't hold it structure well, it wasn't as long or wide as my older model and it wasn't as soft
customer_reviews.author: AJ's Mom

customer_reviews.title: No toys included but the product seems good.
customer_reviews.text: The bassinet itself seems great, the only thing I have to complain is the missing toys. It should have come with two plushies and none were in the package.
customer_reviews.author: Camila S.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this co-sleeping brand!
customer_reviews.text: We love this co-sleeper. During the day, we usually sit it on the couch with her in it, asleep. At night, it’s in her crib and she sleeps in it. It’s put me at ease because I do not like sleeping in the bed with my baby. She is 7 lbs even and 20 inches long with plenty of room to grow. The shape is odd at first but it has settled since being unpackaged.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Travel Bassinet For Infant Baby
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect item to transport my newest great grandson to go to his God Mother's, mom's and my house. Excellent item indeed.
customer_reviews.author: fanhayes

customer_reviews.title: Soft bassinet designed to keep baby comfy
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves sleeping in his bassinet. The hood prevents baby from waking up when the lights get turned on. Also it’s soft so baby sleeps comfortably when placing bassinet on soft surfaces
customer_reviews.author: NancyFMED

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional bassinet
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute little bed. The bed folds into a backpack that you can wear and it’s easy to fold back up. My daughter is three months old and can still fit in it as it’s pretty long.
customer_reviews.author: Sb1983Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Love this item already
customer_reviews.text: My newborn slept harder than she has ever slept in this thing. Me and my husband were able to sleep more soundly too knowing that she was safely protected while cosleeping in our bed. Love this item already!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly cox

customer_reviews.title: Cute , But they grow out of it so fast .
customer_reviews.text: I liked this bassinet, however babies grow out of it very fast . My daughter only used it the first month. I used it in the living room next to me on the sofa where I can convertibly watch tv and she would be napping shielded from the tv . It was nice . So 70 dollers for just a month it was not worth it for me ,
customer_reviews.author: Marian

customer_reviews.title: Hmmmm
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice for travel use, but hard and stiff in my point of view. Only thing i liked was how it easyily turns into a backpack. I returned and got a bassinet instead. For the same price
customer_reviews.author: Marium Huss

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely horrible. The sides constantly collapse and does not stay up. I definitely wont be putting my baby in this and I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: We love the lulyboo travel bassinet for our son, we put it in the middle of us on the bed and that’s wear he sleeps, he loves being in between his mama and daddy.
customer_reviews.author: Boricua_3323

customer_reviews.title: Super adorable in person
customer_reviews.text: Super adorable in person, easy set up, would recommend something in between this and floor given that it is semi-thin/you can feel your fingers through it somewhat. Just put some padding in it if anything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was the best thing for our baby
customer_reviews.text: This was the best thing for our baby. We could bring her everywhere and keep her out of the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition....
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Love the neutral checkered pattern. Easy to assemble and easy to move around. Packing up is a breeze. A nice comfy place for baby when visiting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Drop the mic 🎤 it was a perfect gift for my daughter and son-in-law
customer_reviews.text: Drop the mic 🎤 it was a perfect gift for my daughter and son-in-law. They are constantly busy and this baby-lounge will come in handy when needed. It is much nicer than I expected, so thank you 😊
customer_reviews.author: Denise Eckermann

customer_reviews.title: We used this during nights, we keep our baby ...
customer_reviews.text: We used this during nights, we keep our baby safe this way between us and over the night it is very handy, we can reach our baby easily
customer_reviews.author: MaviJeans

customer_reviews.title: Great Products
customer_reviews.text: Love this great for travels. If I would search a little more would have prefer to get the same item, but one that plays music and vibrates. All in all happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sarajane

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for baby and perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews on products I purchase but I had to make one for this! I am a new mom my baby is almost 3 months old and he loves this. He sleeps very easily in it. I love this bassinet!
customer_reviews.author: Blanche

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and versatile for bith indoors and out
customer_reviews.text: Simple, light, easy to use and comfortable for baby. The shade is nice to block the sun or lights while baby is napping. Like that the material is durable enough to sit outside in the grass, etc in warmer weather
customer_reviews.author: brooks

customer_reviews.title: worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: perfect for my son who hates his bassinet. easy to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Using as a bassinet for regular use. Baby sleeps soundly in it...seems baby feels more secure in it.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and easy to use my daughter loved it
customer_reviews.text: Infant to 3 months only after that you will need another one, great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jay S

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made
customer_reviews.text: I like this but the price was a bit high after purchasing it I found a cradle that’s bigger and baby will be able to use much longer
customer_reviews.author: Debra Gilsenan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect portable little bed!
customer_reviews.text: This little bed is great! Use it all the time around the house or for traveling for a perfect lightweight little place to keep the baby safe. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Riggs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baby naps!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I use it everyday for when my baby is napping and I can’t hold him. Only thing I would change is for the pad to be removable or have a cover, as my baby has spit up in it and it’s very noticeable :(
customer_reviews.author: Tristen

customer_reviews.title: Great Co sleeper
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and easy to clean. Packed it up and took it on a trip to NC a lifesaver with a 3 month old and much easier to travel with than a pack and play.
customer_reviews.author: njh

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product. My son uses it everyday and night and he has a spreate standard crib. I like this product because my son and I lay side by side on the bed so it makes it more easy for me to pick him up quicker.
customer_reviews.author: Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 13 day old goddaughter when she visits. She slept soundly while at my place for the weekend. I love the neutral color and how compact it is. I dislike the fact that the end that is folded doesn’t immediately regain its shape but other than that it’s awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Kym S.

customer_reviews.title: Best buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for when my grandson visits. It’s so cozy and he really sleeps well in it. It works so well, I had to buy one for my daughter at her home. The baby prefers this to his bassinet.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela S Talarico

customer_reviews.title: Amazing purchase
customer_reviews.text: U just received it couple days ago.. my wife loved it for our new baby.. Great look East to carry Comfortable for the baby And I would recommend it..
customer_reviews.author: Josaih-Albr

customer_reviews.title: Big but nice
customer_reviews.text: My baby sleeps great in this. It is really big so if you want to use it in a bed make sure you have a king or queen. If you dont have a partner sharing the bed a smaller bed should be good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, but pricey
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, but a little pricey. My daughter cannot use it after 3 months. It is too small.
customer_reviews.author: Lily jones

customer_reviews.title: Love this bassinet!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this! It’s perfect for travel and visiting at grandparents house. Our daughter is very comfortable in it! Highly recommended for people traveling or want an extra place for the baby to sleep/ lounge around the house!
customer_reviews.author: Jopp14

customer_reviews.title: Such a multi function purchase. Best value baby item.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was absolutely thrilled when she received this. It will be used at home and when we travel.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: The cover comes off with a zipper so it's easy to clean. Its durable and is able to be carried like a backpack. Perfect for at home or for travel. I am using it for my month old son and used it since we brought him home. Perfect for on the bed or now we put it in our side sleeper. Fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: Liked it. Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: Liked it. Not bad. But price seems little bit high compared to the material.
customer_reviews.author: Muzadded Abdullah

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for small spaces or travel!
customer_reviews.text: We were living in an RV for our daughter’s first few months so this was the perfect find for our tiny space! It was comfy & easy to wash and reassemble. Folding it is super easy also! Sides are secure. She was very cozy! Outgrew it around 5-6 months old.
customer_reviews.author: Karly Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for this item
customer_reviews.text: Not as it shows in the website its too expensive
customer_reviews.author: Abdullah Radhwan

customer_reviews.title: This is wonderful. Wonderful for that newborn travel
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful. Wonderful for that newborn travel, outings, picnics, etc. the fact that it is a backpack really frees up the hands
customer_reviews.author: PCDC

customer_reviews.title: It's a great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Super practical. You can also use it during the day for naps around the house. Super easy to machine wash too. Bought one for a cousin and ended up buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Fab Yaz

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I like it, the size is ok, color is beautifull. Quality very good. I hope my baby will like it!!!And it fits to mini playard :D
customer_reviews.author: Marcin

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time. Some complaints were about it holding the “bean” shape when it first arrived but by taking off the cover and rotating the foam pad it removes that bend. It’s not as sturdy on the bottom as I was hoping, but when placed on a softer surface it’s fine.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Sallis

customer_reviews.title: Pleased momma!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my newborn and all I can say is wow! I am so glad I got it. My baby seems to not like bassinets but this one is different- he sleeps so well in it and looks extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Lidia

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel with an infant up to 9mo
customer_reviews.text: This product was a perfect purchase for our vacation with my 8 mo old. She fits in it perfectly and it's great for her to sleep and sit up. She does sleep on her back.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Its comfy enough for my son. Big enough for him to grow. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Nice for co-sleeping with newborn
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my newborn for co-sleeping on my bed. The quality is great and the hood prevents light from falling on baby's face. The base is not thick, the softness depends on the surface you place it on.
customer_reviews.author: Ashwini

customer_reviews.title: Basically eliminates the need to buy a baby bed. ...
customer_reviews.text: Basically eliminates the need to buy a baby bed. Our little daughter loves it and we are able to get her everywhere we go with us.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and Breathable
customer_reviews.text: We use this allot and it safe and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: David

feature_bullets: Transforms into a backpack in one motion
